Name: Fireworks Show VR
About the game: Welcome to Magnificent Bay City! Enjoy this wonderful auto-generated fireworks show in the evening while listening to music! You can also release fireworks in a variety of colors! Plus, you can edit your custom fireworks show in the exclusive studio afterwards! Current features: VR support: Support for multiple exclusive VR fireworks show viewing experiences that can be moved in small areas. Multiple fireworks: Nearly thirty kinds of dazzling variety of fireworks. The musical climax also has a chance to produce super fireworks! Procedurally generated fireworks show: import your own music, and the core program will analyze and display a fireworks show that fits on its own. Release the fireworks: Hit the colored fireworks box to release the brilliant fireworks. The harder you hit, the more fireworks you'll release! Light a firework bomb aside, too! Don't worry, the fireworks bombs will refresh automatically. In addition, you can also sit in a hot air balloon and wave handheld fireworks. Laser Show: 4 beams of oscillating lasers that automatically change colors to music. Comes with music: Comes with 4 different styles of music for enjoyment. List Play: You can add any music to the list, and it will be displayed automatically in order afterwards! Support fireworks show file or generate fireworks show in real time! Viewing locations: Feel free to choose the location where you want to watch the fireworks show. There are NPCs at each location to enjoy with you. Fireworks Show Studio: Quickly edit your own exclusive fireworks show performance! Select an existing show music file, play it to the location you want to change, place and remove fireworks cards in the sandbox and you're done! All fireworks categories including Super Fireworks are supported. Development Roadmap: Single music effect enhancement -> Interactive effect enhancement -> Environment enhancement -> Performance optimization -> Multi music -> Multiplayer -> Editor -> Mod support A bunch of new features are being planned and worked on, so feel free to let me know if you have any questions during play on the Discord channel, Steam community, or by sending me an email! Thanks again for choosing to play Music & Fireworks Show!
